overview: Ether does, as so many authors have done before, writes about what she knows best, but as a result of her torrid, tempestuous vacation, Ether's formerly best-selling books have gone over the line from erotica to pornography. Having discovered the passionate pleasures of anal, oral and group sex, she is finally able to extinguish the air of false respectability which has plagued her and her books.
title: Dangerous Things 2
